casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Larry Jovan ADAMS, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 158620
COA: 337330 Supreme Court of Michigan. March 5, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the October 2, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered and, it appearing to this Court that the case of People v. Washington (Docket No. 156648) is pending on appeal before this Court and that the decision in that case may resolve an issue raised in the present application for leave to appeal, we ORDER that the application be held in ABEYANCE pending the decision in that case.
